# File lib/external/patches/windows_io.rb, line 30
      def pos=(pos)
        if pos < POSITION_MAX
          super(pos)
          @pos = nil
        elsif @pos != pos
          # note sysseek appears to be necessary here, rather than io.seek
          @pos = pos
        
          super(POSITION_MAX)
          pos -= POSITION_MAX
        
          while pos > POSITION_MAX
            pos -= POSITION_MAX
            self.sysseek(POSITION_MAX, ::IO::SEEK_CUR)
          end
        
          self.sysseek(pos, ::IO::SEEK_CUR)
        end
      end
